column4: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Cases Pending Investigation from Previous Year (Col.4)
column5: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Cases Reported during the Year (Col.5)
column6: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Total Cases for Investigation (Col.6) = (Col.4+Col.5)
column7: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Cases not Investigated or Investigation Dropped (Col.7)
column8: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Final Report - True but Insufficient Evidence (Col.8)
column9: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Final Report - False, Mistake of Fact or Non-Cognizible or Civil in Nature (Col.9)
column10: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Final Report - Total (Col.10) = (Col.8 + Col.9)
column11: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Cases Chargesheeted (Col.11)
column12: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Cases Pending Investigation at the End of the Year * (Col.12)
column13: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Percentage of Cases Chargesheeted To Total Cases Investigated (Col.13)
column14: Disposal during Investigation Stage/Disposal by Police - Pendency Percentage (Col.14) = (Col.11/ Col.6) * 100
